content: Great app, much easier to navigate than using the paper maps!
Works great
Very helpful especially when you're out on the trails
I have used this 4 times, works only 50% of the time. 2 out of 4 times, it would not save the track.

The app I feel is very helpful. It shows your location very accurately. The trails are marked very well. The map orient N/S/E/W so as to the direction. The fact that it covers the entire State. Great asset for trail riding.

Love the app only 2 complaints some times when you move map around it freezes and crashes plus I noticed the direction it shows you looking at changes on its own seen it change over 90 degrees to wrong direction
Great app
Much better this year. The only problem I have with it is you have to have Internet To open the program. Which is a pain when you are out of the service area.
Sometimes it doesn't load the way it supposed to
Freezes up a lot or restarts,,,,running Samsung tablet
The app crashes but other than that works well. You can be tracked as long as you get cell service
Very helpful app!
A must have in my opinion. Has saved my skin a couple times!
So far this app seems to be very accurate and helpful. It's certainly worth the few dollars it costs.
Excellent and well worth the money if riding in NH
Best thing that has happened to map systems without having to buy an expensive GPS
replyContent: Hi Peter, thanks for your awesome review! Ride safe, the Mapgears Team

content: Nice App. There are some trail segments which are not connected which creates some issues with the navigation function. The app could be improved by allowing users to select rote options. I would also suggest allowing users to select between a topo map and satellite map for the background. There appears to be a missing section of trail 402 between Rindge and Milford. I would also like to have information on the clubs linked to the trails that they maintain.
replyContent: Hi Todd, thanks for the great review and for pointing out the issue with trail segments. We will work on that to fix the problem promptly. Ride safe, the Mapgears team

content: Wouldn't let me access app.
replyContent: Hi there, can you reach out to us at nhsa@evtrails.com with more details about what exactly is happening? Ride safe, the Mapgears team

content: Took a few trys to get the app to load. Seems great now. Motorola Razr
replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your awesome feedback! Have a good day and ride safe, the Mapgears Team

content: So far I like the app. What would make it better would be if you could actually type in the location you're looking to go to versus having to tap on the map to get a general area
replyContent: Hi Sylvie, thanks for reaching out to us. You can use the search feature represented by a magnifying glass button at the top left of your screen to input a specific destination. You will then be able to create a route to that point once you tap on it in the search results. Hope that helps! Ride safe, the Mapgears team

content: App won't download correctly
replyContent: Hi Bill, thanks for reaching out to us. Could you send us an email over at nhsa@evtrails.com with more details as to what exactly is happening on your side? We'll be glad to help you out. Ride safe, the Mapgears team

content: After you open the app it says loading trail data then crashes. Edit - 10/19/20 reloaded and problem appears to be fixed.
replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We noticed crashes on some Android devices and we fixed it. Can you try again and keep us informed if everything works well by contacting us at nhsa@evtrails.com. Have a nice day and ride safe. The Mapgears Team
